flc.nbl_actors.experimental.log

Class MessageRelay

  • java.lang.Object
    • flc.nbl_actors.experimental.log.MessageRelay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageRelay

    public class MessageRelay
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageRelay
    Standard message relay implementation. Calls to intercept(Runnable, IGreenThr) are logged per thread to listener instances, generated by given IMsgListenerFactory

    Date 16.01.2015

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageRelay

        public MessageRelay(IMsgListenerFactory factory)
        Parameters:
        factory - Called once per real thread. Enables parallel event logging. The generator should return either (i) a single synchronized listener instance, or (ii) a separate listener per call (data may be merged later).

    • Method Detail

      • intercept

        public java.lang.Runnable intercept(java.lang.Runnable msg,
                                    IGreenThr thread)
        Description copied from interface: IMessageRelay
        Intercept runnable message. To be called when message is sent. The returned (possibly instrumented) message should be added to the thread-queue instead of the original message. The message has been received when Runnable.run() is called.
        Specified by:
        intercept in interface IMessageRelay
        Parameters:
        msg - original message
        thread - green-thread to execute the message
        Returns:
        original message, optionally wrapped in another Runnable for listening purposes. (eg. message tracing and debugging)

      • logInfo

        public static void logInfo(java.lang.String info)

      • logInfo

        public static void logInfo(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> info)
        Set user-defined log info in a ThreadLocal variable (java.lang.ThreadLocal), to be attached to next message-send log event. Useful for adding labels and state information to message-trace. Used when IGreenThrFactory.setMessageRelay(IMessageRelay) is set with an instance of this class, and consumed with first call to intercept(Runnable, IGreenThr).
        Parameters:
        info - extra log information
